owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._fromChains: The chain Ids to withdraw tokens.
params._ratios: The withdrawal ratios of each token.
params._slippages: The max slippages of each token for cross-chain withdraw.
params._toChain: The chain Id to receive the withdrawn tokens.
params._tokens: The token to withdraw on each fromChain.
params._wdSeq: The unique sequence number to identify this withdrawal request.

addLiquidity(address,uint256).notice: Add liquidity to the pool-based bridge. NOTE: This function DOES NOT SUPPORT fee-on-transfer / rebasing tokens.

withdraw(uint64,address,uint64,uint64[],.notice: Withdraw liquidity from the pool-based bridge. NOTE: Each of your withdrawal request should have different _wdSeq. NOTE: Tokens to withdraw within one withdrawal request should have the same symbol.
